subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis Rams released quarterback Marc Bulger, perhaps clearing the way for them to take Oklahoma’s Sam Bradford, the 2008 Heisman Trophy winner, with the first pick of the draft this month.
snippet: The St. Louis Rams released quarterback Marc Bulger, perhaps clearing the way for them to take Oklahoma’s Sam Bradford, the 2008 Heisman Trophy winner, with the first pick of the draft this month.
